title: ABB Robotics seeks to standardize measurement of robot energy consumption
description:
ABB Robotics said new energy consumption measurement will allow end users to make more informed decisions and support sustainability efforts.

The post ABB Robotics seeks to standardize measurement of robot energy consumption appeared first on The Robot Report.
